description:
The composition of the Seven Warlords of the Sea has changed repeatedly throughout the times.
http://anidb.net/ch3012 [Crocodile] was stripped of his title after being defeated by the http://anidb.net/ch1954 [Straw Hats pirates] and his schemes in the Arabasta kingdom were revealed.
Replacing him was http://anidb.net/ch3842 [Marshall D. Teach], only to resign during the Paramount War.
http://anidb.net/ch6070 [Jinbei] refused to take part in the Paramount War and also resigned.
http://anidb.net/ch3596 [Gekkou Moriah] was stripped of his title after being defeated by the Straw Hats, shortly after the Paramount War.
http://anidb.net/ch6053 [Trafalgar Law], a new replacement, forfeited his title for making an alliance with the Straw Hats pirates.
http://anidb.net/ch2136 [Donquixote Doflamingo] lost his title after being defeated by the Straw Hats and Law`s alliance and his schemes in Dressrosa were revealed.
http://anidb.net/ch3840 [Dracule Mihawk], http://anidb.net/ch3841 [Bartholomew Kuma] and http://anidb.net/ch6071 [Boa Hancock], along with the new replacements http://anidb.net/ch702 [Buggy] and http://anidb.net/ch88272 [Edward Weevil], were the active members when the decision about the abolition of the entire system was made.
name: Shichibukai
